definition: to walk unsteadily/to stagger/to lurch/to hobble/to totter

sentences.english: The old basketball star walks gingerly on aching knees.
sentences.chinese: 年邁的籃球明星會因膝蓋的傷痛步履蹣跚。

sentences.english: The old man faltered as he climbed the hill.
In the distance wild dogs barked, and a flock of ducks passed over.
sentences.chinese: 遠處幾隻野狗在叫，一羣鴨子蹣跚走過。

sentences.english: A child was toddling along the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 一個小孩正沿着人行道蹣跚行走。

sentences.english: She stumbled into my arms and we wept together.
sentences.chinese: 她踉蹣跚蹌地撲進我的懷裏，我們都哭了。

sentences.english: The hungry marchers shambled slowly along the road.
sentences.chinese: 行軍的人餓得步履蹣跚在路上慢慢走着。

sentences.english: Children as young as two toddle in and climb the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 兩歲左右的孩童蹣跚地走進教室，攀爬樓梯。

sentences.english: Every dusk, mother would waddles home with a heavy sack on her back.
sentences.chinese: 每天黃昏，母親都揹着重重的袋子蹣跚而歸。

sentences.english: The child was toddling along the road.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子正蹣跚地沿着馬路走。

sentences.english: The old man hobbled along with the help of his grandson.
sentences.chinese: 老人在他的孫子挽扶下蹣跚而行。

sentences.english: The lights grow brighter as the earth lurches away from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 大地蹣跚着離開太陽，電燈顯得更亮。

sentences.english: Tongue lolling, the dog came lolloping back from the forest.
sentences.chinese: 那隻狗伸着舌頭從樹林裏蹣跚地跑回來。

sentences.english: Sheep and cows were meandering in the fields, and the blue sky stretched out for miles.
sentences.chinese: 牛羊在田野中蹣跚，藍天一望無際。

sentences.english: He toddled over and pounced on the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 他蹣跚走來，伸手猛抓小雞。

sentences.english: The sight of travelers huffing and puffing their way along drew the ire of the media.
sentences.chinese: 旅客蹣跚行走的畫面，引來媒體的批判。

sentences.english: He came waddling down the hall like a penguin.
sentences.chinese: 他在大廳裏蹣跚而行，就像一隻企鵝。

definition: to chat with a low voice
lit. to comb one's hair in the wind and wash it in the rain (idiom)/fig. to work in the open regardless of the weather
a white steed flits past a crack (idiom); How time flies!
